title: Hotkeys Don't Work Upon Entering a Match
body:
I have previously reported this problem [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/d7gfGb6p-hotkeys-stop-working-during-random-matches) and [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Ek8AXFEl-gameplay-any-champion-hotkeys-do-not-work-and-cannot-be-reset).

I can't use my QWER, 1234, T, H, or ping hotkeys. I can't reset them. I basically have to tell my team we need to surrender. Usually they don't understand and so I end up playing a 20-30 minute match where I'm completely outmatched and have no hope of being able to combo. This used to be an infrequent problem, happening maybe once every 15-20 matches, but now it's almost every match.

replies.body:
Hmmmmm it sounds like your client is having a hard time pulling your hotkeys from the servers. I want you to try resetting your config files again in a specific order, so try following these steps and let me know if it helps!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

If you look at the threads I linked to in my post, you'll see this was the solution you gave me last time. It works temporarily, but it isn't a permanent fix. Please advise, is there any way to fix this on a more permanent basis? It happens too frequently now for this fix to be practical.
